Class Empire.SoundsOfEmpire

  • java.lang.Object
    • lord.of.rome.Empire.SoundsOfEmpire
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    Empire

    public static final class Empire.SoundsOfEmpire
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class which represents all possible sounds of empire and living creatures.
    Author:
    Carlos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
